Translations.Text: Kol ko ɓee naamnandirta
Ko faati e kabaaru mawɗo
Mboɓe luuri e mum
Alah wonah noon, maɓe nganndu
Refti yaama maɓe nganndu
Mbela Min mbaɗaani leydi ndaɗɗudi keblaandi
E pelleɗe ngona penɗe
Min tagi on kuɓe
Min mbaɗi ɗoyngol mon fooftere
Min mbaɗi jemma o ko sutura
Min mbaɗi ñalawma ko yiilaraade nguura
Min mahi dow mon jeeɗiɗi cattuɗi
Min mbaɗi lampu jalbuɗo kuɓɓam
Min tellini ummaade e duule ndiyam njuppajam sanne
Ngam Min njaltina heen gabbe e puɗi
E gese piilandirɗe
Pellet, ko ñalaande Senndindiro ngon, laatinooma ko saatinaa
Ñande allaadu ndu wutta ma on ngardu pelle pelle
Kammu on udditee mbo laato dame
Pelle ɗe yahnaa ɗe ngonta merere
Pellet Yiite jahannama wonti tommborde
Nge wonanii bewɓe ɓe ruttorde
Ma ɓe ñiiɓ toon dummunaaji
ɓe meeɗatah toon ɓuuɓol wolla ndiyam ɓuuɓɗam
Si wonah patɗam ƴiiƴiiri
Njobdi kawrundi e koɓe ngonno ko
Pellet ɓe ngoniina ɓe njoortaaki haasboore
ɓe pennii aayeeje Amen pennugol
Kala huunde min tonngirii nde binndol
Meeɗe Min ɓeydantah on si wonah lepte
Pellet na woodani hulɓe Alla ɓe foolirde
Gese e inabeeje
E ƴoolnuɓe giƴiraaɓe
E kaas sanngara keewɗo
Ɓe nanataa nder toon haala meere, wanaa ko bakkondiŋta
Ko njoɓdi ummaade ka Alla e dokke keƴɗe
jom kammu e leydi e ko woni hakkunde mum en jurmtooɗo Mbo ɓe ngalah e dow Mum haala
Ñande jibriil ummii tawa malayka en na waɗi sappeeli ɓe haalatah si wonah mbo Alla sakkitani o haala ko feewi
Ko oon woni ñalngu goongo kala faalaaɗo daɗde nanngira joomiiko ruttorde
Min njeertinii on lepte ɓadiiɗe ñande aade ndaari ko juuɗe mum mbaɗno keefeero o wiya haaniina mi woniina leydi
Alla woondirii malayka en pooɗooji pittaali pooɗgol cattungol
Alla woondirii malayka en ittatɗi pittaali e newuya
Alla woondirii lummbatooɗi lummbagol
Alla woondarii daɗandirooji daɗndirgol
E Alla woondirii yiilayɗi yamiroore
ñande dimmbii dimmbatnde
Rewa e hendu woɗndu
ɓerɗe ɗe ñande heen na kuli
Ndaarɗe mum en na koyi
Hoɓe mbi*a mbela komin ruttatooɓe no min ngonirnoo
Mbela somin ngontii ƴi*e ndappuɗe min nduttoto
ɓe mbi*a si min nduttiima sinnda de ɗum wona duttal pertungal
ɗuum ko haacaango wooto
Ndeke tan ɓe ngontii wuurɓe
taw si arii e maaɗa Yewtere fii Muusaa
Tuma nde joom Makko noddi mbo ka caatngol Tuwaa
Yahu ka Fir'awna, pellet, kanko o bewi
Maakan mbo mbela woodanaani ma nde laaɓata e keefaraagal
Mi feewnu ma e joom ma kulaa Mbo
O holli mbo aaya mawɗo on
O fennii o woopi
Refti o runtii hombo yaha
O renndini o noddi
O wi*i ko miin woni joom mon ɓurɗo toowde
Alla nanngiri mbo lepte cakkitiiɗe e gadane
Wonii e ɗuum teskuya wonande kulɗo Alla
Mbela ko tagde mon ɓuri sattude wolla ko kammu mbo O mahi o
O ɓamti mbildi mammbo O fotndi mbo
O niɓɓaɗini jemma makko O yaltini annoore makko
E leydi ndi caggal ɗuum O werti ndi. @Corrected
O yaltini heen ndiyam mayri e durngol mayri
Pelle ɗe O ñiɓi ɗe
Ngam wona nafoore mon e kulle mon
Si wuttaandu ɗimmuru ndu arii
ñalawma mbo kala aade siftori ko o yahnoo
Yiite nge ɓannginane wonande oon ji*oowo
Tawi ko oon bewɗo
O ɓurni nguurndam aduna
Ko yiite woni hoɗorde makko
Tawi ko oon kulɗo daraade e yeeso joom makko o haɗi fittaandu belaaɗe
Ko aljanna woni hoɗorde makko
Hoɓe naaamna Ma ndey darnga daroto
A alanah ɗum ganndal saka kaala ɗum
Ko e joom ma tan woni haaɗtirde ganndal darnga
Ngonɗa tan ko jeertinoowo wonande kulɗo mbo
Elle kamɓe ñande ɓe nji*ata darnga ɓe ñiiɓaani si wonah kikiiɗa yel wolla feññaange
O ñirɓanii o runtii
Sabu arde e Makko gumɗo
Hol ko anndin Ma yaama o laaɓa
Wolla o waajito waaju o nafa mbo
Tawi ko oon jondaniiɗo o hoore makko
Aan noon haɗa faloo mbo
Alah ko fawi Ma si o laaɓaani
Tawi ko oon garɗo e Ma hombo yaha
Hombo huli Alla
Aan haɗa sokliri mbo gaa e woɓɓe
Alah ɗuum ko ciftanirgol
Ko kala faalaaɗo jantoo mbo
E nder ɗeri teddinaaɗi
ɓamtaaɗo ceninaaɗo
Hombo e juuɗe malayka en
Tedduɓe heewɓe jam
Huɗaama aade alah ko ɓuri mbo heefarinde
E honde huunde O tagri mbo
E toɓɓere O tagri mbo o hoddiri mbo
Refti O newnani mbo laawol
Refti O wari mbo O naatni mbo yenaande
Refti si O faalaama O ummina mbo
Alah o waɗaani ko Alla yamiri mbo
Yo aadee ndaar ñaamdu makko
Min njuppii ndiyam ɗam juppugol
Refti Min ceeki leydi ndi ceekgol
Min puɗni e hendi gabbe
E inabu e ñaayka ngam daabe
E oliv e tamara
E gese keewɗe leɗɗe
E muuyanteele e huɗo ngam daabe
Ngam wona nafoore mon e kulle mon
Si haacaango ngo arii
ñande aade dogi musiɗɗo makko
E neene makko e baaba makko
E gondiijo makko e ɓiɓɓe makko
Kala aade e mum en ñande heen na jogii ko yoni mbo
Geece malaabe ñande heen na fooyni
Hoɗe njala hoɗe mbeltii
Geece goo na e dow mum en punndi-sollaaru
Na hippaɗe niwre
Ko ɓeen ngoni heefareeɓe faajireeɓe
Si kammu hofaama
Si koode caami
Si pelle ɗe nawaama
Si geloobi cowiiɗi dudnaama
Si kulle ladde ndenndinaama
Si maaje ɗe kuɓɓaama
Si pittaali cinndindiraama
Si ubbangel na wuuri naamnaama
Hol bakkaat ngel wardaa
Si ɗeri caaktaama
Si kammu o huuftaama
Si yiite huɓɓaama
Si aljanna ɓallinaama
Fittaandu annda ko ndu addi
Mbeɗa woondira koode birniiɗe
Dogooje birnatooɗe
Mi woondarii jemma si mbo arii e niɓɓidde
E subaka si annoore mum feeñi
wonnde pellet, [Alqur'aana] ko konngol Nulaaɗo tedduɗo
jom semmbe ka jom arsi dokkaaɗo daraja. @Corrected
ɗoftaaɗo toon koolaaɗo
Gondiijo mon o wonah haangaaka
Ko goongo O yi*ii mbo to jookli laaɓtuɗi
O wonah ɗawoowo yottinde mon mbirniindi
Quraana wonah konngol seytaan diddaaɗo yurmeende on
Hoɗo njahaton
Ndee [Alqur’aanaare] wonaali, si wanaa waaju tageefo ngon
Kala faalaaɗo e mon fooccaade
On faaletaake fooccaade si wonah Alla haaje ɗuum jom binnde On
Si kammu on fettii
Si koode ɗe cariima
Si maaje ɗe puccitaama
Si genaale mbaylaama
Fittaandu annda kondu waɗno e golle e kondu leelnuno e golle
Eehey ma neɗɗanke hol ko hoomtuma e joom ma Tedduɓɗo O
Oon takɗo ma O fotndi terɗ ma O waɗ ma potandirɗo
E kala mbaadi ndi O haaja O feewnir ma
Alah, woni ko on yeddooɓe ñalngu noɓdi
Pellet ina woodi e dow mon malaykaaji deenooji
Tedduɗi binndooji
Gannduɗi ko ngolloton
Pellet ɓeen ɗigguɓe hoɓe e neema
Faajireeɓe noon ina e yiite
Hoɓe naatange ñande ñalngu njoɓdi
ɓe ngonah wirnatooɓe nge haa bada
Holko anndin ma ñalngu njobdi
Refti holko anndin ma ñalngu njobdi
ñande fittaandu jogantaaki fittaandu hay huunde huunde fof ko Alla woodani ñande heen
Halkaare woodanii ɓeen ustooɓe peese
ɓeen peesnatooɓe yimɓe ɓe ɗaɓɓa timminaneede
Siɓe ɓetanii ɓe wolla ɓe peesanii ɓe usta
E ɓee kan fellitaa wonnde ko ɓe immintinteeɓe
Woodanii mbo ñalngu mawngu
ñande yimɓe ummanii jom binnde
Alah, pellet deftere faajireeɓe nani e sijijiin
Ko honɗum anndin maa ko woni SijjIiin
Ko deftere tonngaande
haray nden ñalnde, bone woodanii fennuɓe ɓen
ɓeen fennooɓe ñalaande njoɓdi
Fennatah mbo si wonah kala palguɗo keerol bakkadinɗo
Si Aayeeje Amen ɗen janngaama e [tawnde] makko, o wi'a: "Ko tinndi adinooɓe
Alah, kono muuri ɓerɗe maɓɓe koɓe pennatnoo ko
Alah ɓeen de koɓe haɗaaɓe yiide joomi mum en
Refti pellet koɓe naatooɓe yiite
Refti ɓe wi*e:"Meeɗee lepte mon ɗen; ko ɗum woni ko pennatɗon kon
Alah, pellet deftere ɗigguɓe nani e ka illiyyiina
Ko honɗum anndin maa ko woni Illiyyiina
Ko deftere tonngaande
Na seedoo nde ɓurɓe ɓadaade
Pellet ɓeen ɗigguɓe hoɓe e neema
E leece hoɓe ndaara
Ina anndee e geeece mum en weltaare neema
Hoɓe yarnee dola omndaako
Haaɗtirde mum ko lati misku e ɗuum de yo fooɗondir fooɗondirooɓe
Hombo e Tasniim ɗuum ko seewnde ɓurnde toowde to aljanna
Seewnde nde ɓurɓe ɓadaade njarata
ɓeen faajirinɓe ngoniina na njala ɓeen goonɗinɓe
Siɓe mbirtiima ɓe ɓe ngona e ɓiiñandirde
Siɓe nduttiima e koreeji maɓɓe ɓe ndutto koɓe weltiiɓe
Siɓe nji*iiɓe ɓe mbi*a ɓe ko ɓe majjuɓe
ɓe nelaaka e dow mum en ngam reende ɓe
Hannde de goonɗinɓe njala heeferɓe
E leece hoɓe ndaara
Mbela heeferɓe njoɓaama koɓe mbaɗatnoo ko
Si kammu on fettii
Mbo heɗtii joomiiko hakke woodani mbo
Si leydi fooɗtaama
Ndi werlii ko woni e hendi ndi acciti
Mbo heɗtii joomiiko Mbo hakke woodani O
Eehey maa aade aan ko a tampoowa golloowo faade e joom ma ko a kawroowo e makko
Tawi ko oon tottiraaɗo deftere mum junnga ñaama
Yaama o haasbe haasbeere newiinde
O ruttoo to banndiraaɓe mum ko o beltiiɗo
Tawi ko oon tottiraaɗo deftere makko caggal keeci makko
Yaama o nodda halkaare
O naatnee yiite
Pellet o woniina beltiiɗe e nder koreeji mum
Pellet o sikkiina o ruttataaka
Oho kay pellet joom makko na yi*a mbo
Mbeɗa woondira mboɗeeri koode saanga mutal
O woondiri jemma e kombo mofti
O woondirii lewru sundu renndii
Ma on peewnire tigi ommboode e dow ommbbde
Hol ko haɗi ɓee goonɗinde
Si Quraana janngaama e dow mum en ɓe cujjatah
Woni kay ko ɓeen yedduɓe ko fennooɓe
Ko Alla anndi ko ɓe coomi e ɓerɗe mum en
Habruɓe lepte muusɗe
Si wonah ɓeen gomɗimɓe ɓe golli golle moƴƴ ɗe, hino woodani ɓe njoɓdi ndi taƴondirtaa
Mi woondirii kammu jom ɗate ngun
O woondirii ñalawma podaaɗo o
O woodarii kala ceediiɗo e kala ko seedaaɗo
Huɗaama yimɓe Ukhduud-fettinɓe leydi petti mawɗi
Yiite marnge kuɓɓam
Tuma nde ɓe jooɗi e dow mannge
Kamɓe koɓe mbaɗata ko goonɗinɓe ɓe koɓe seediiɓe
ɓe njoftiraaki ɓe si wonah ɓe ngoonɗinii Alla tedduɗo jettaaɗo
Ko Alla Woodani Laamu kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin. Alla ko Kattanɗo kala huunde
ɓeen fawɓe e dow juulɓe rewɓe e worɓe fitina refti ɓe tuubaani woodaniiɓe lepte jahannama woodaniiɓe lepte cumooje
ɓeen goonɗinɓe ngoolli golle lobbe woodaniiɓe Aljannaaji na ila ley mum caatli ko ɗuum woni malal manngal. @Corrected
Pellet nanngannde joom ma ko sattunde
Ko Kanko tigi fuɗɗata tagu O rutta mbo
Ko Kanko woni Yaafatooɗo Giɗo
Mbo arsi tedduɗo woodani. @Corrected

taw si arii e maaɗa Yewtere fii Muusaa

Hombo e alluwal deenangal

Hol ko anndin ma ko woni hoodere feeñoore jemma
Hoodere fooynunde
Alah fittaandu si wonah ina e dow mayru deenoowo
Yo aade ndaaru ko o tagraa ko
O tagiraama ko e ndiyam nduñotoɗam
Hombo e hakkunde keeci gorko e ƴi*e ɓernde debba
Hombo hattani ruttude mbo
ñande cuuɗiiɗi kuncaa
Alanah mbo semmbe wonah balloowo
Mi woondirii kammu jom ɗate ngun
O woondirii leydi mbaɗndi petti

Mbo wonah gaajaate

Mi fewja feere
Muñanɓe muñangol setta
Senin innde joom Ma ɓurnde toowde
Oon takɗo O fonndi
Oon koddirɗo refti O feewni
Oon yaltinɗo durngol
O watti ngol yoorko wayliiko
Ma Min njanngin Ma A yeɓjjittah

Min newnan Ma na newori
Siftinir ɗoon ɗo ciftanirgol na nafata

Woɗɗitoo mbo ɓurɗo hiiteede
Oon naatoowo yiite mannge nge

Malaama oon laaɓɗo e sirku
O jantii Innde joom makko o juuli

ɗum ina e ɗereeji gadiiɗi

taw si arii e maaɗa Yewtere fii darngal

Iram jom doosɗe

ɓeen bewnooɓe to leydi

joom Ma yuppi e maɓɓe lepte cattuɗe
joom Ma na tommbiiɓe

Yaama o wele
E mbeeta

joom Ma accaani Mo O añaani
